Package ohos.nfc.oma

Class SEService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.nfc.oma.SEService

  • public final class SEService
extends Object
    Provides access to secure elements on a device. You can use the interfaces provided by this class to obtain all secure elements and the name of them, check whether the secure element is available, and enable a session on the secure element.

    After that, you can send APDU commands to secure element.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Communication#NFC

      static interface  SEService.OnCallback
      A callback interface used to notify your application of a successful connection to the secure element service.

                 SEService.OnCallback callback)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        A constructor used to create a SEService instance.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        callback - Indicates the interface that is called back when the secure element service is connected.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the caller is missing required context.

    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected​()
        Checks whether the secure element service is connected.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the service is connected; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown​()
        Disables the secure element service.

        This method also disables all sessions and channels of the service.

        Since:
        1

      • getReaders

        public Reader[] getReaders​()
        Obtains all secure elements.
        Returns:
